Name: issue-invoice-editor
Label: Issue Invoice Editor

Components.Label: ShipmentInvoice
Status
Progress
Currency
Print INV One VAT
Components.Query:
WITH hblnolist AS ( SELECT s.HblNo AS hblNos, SUM(s.Quantity) AS quanty, s.ContainerText textc, si.Id AS idinv FROM ShipmentInvoice si CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(si.HblIds, ',') AS split_hbl LEFT JOIN Shipment s ON s.Id = split_hbl.value where si.Id='{Id}' GROUP BY si.Id,s.Quantity,s.ContainerText,s.HblNo ), CurrencySums AS ( SELECT SUM(dt.Quantity*dt.Amount) AS TotalAmount, SUM(dt.TotalAmountTax) AS TotalAFT, SUM(ABS(dt.AmountTax)) AS TaxAmount, dt.Vat, curr.Code AS CurrencyCode, curr.IsLocal AS localcurr FROM dbo.ShipmentInvoiceDetail dt LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON curr.Id = dt.CurrencyId LEFT JOIN dbo.ShipmentInvoice sm ON sm.Id=dt.ShipmentInvoiceId WHERE sm.Id = '{Id}' GROUP BY curr.Code,curr.IsLocal,dt.Vat ), VAT AS ( SELECT (CASE WHEN ISNULL(smdt.Vat,0)=10 THEN ROUND(SUM(smdt.TotalAmount*smdt.ExchangeRateINV)*0.1,0) ELSE 0 END) AS tax10, (CASE WHEN ISNULL(smdt.Vat,0)=8 THEN ROUND(SUM(smdt.TotalAmount*smdt.ExchangeRateINV)*0.08,0) ELSE 0 END) AS tax8, (CASE WHEN ISNULL(smdt.Vat,0)<0 THEN ROUND((ABS(smdt.Vat)*smdt.ExchangeRateINV),0) ELSE 0 END) AS taxOT, (CASE WHEN ISNULL(smdt.Vat,0)=5.26 THEN ROUND(SUM(smdt.TotalAmount*smdt.ExchangeRateINV)*0.0526,0) ELSE 0 END) AS tax5 FROM dbo.ShipmentInvoiceDetail smdt LEFT JOIN dbo.ShipmentInvoice sminv ON smdt.ShipmentInvoiceId=sminv.Id WHERE sminv.Id='{Id}' GROUP BY smdt.Vat,smdt.ExchangeRateINV ), Amountbft AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN (smv3.CurrencyCode IS NULL OR smv3.CurrencyCode<>'VND') THEN dt3.TotalAmount ELSE ROUND(ROUND(dt3.Amount*dt3.ExchangeRateINV,0)*dt3.Quantity,0) END AS BFT FROM dbo.ShipmentInvoiceDetail dt3 JOIN dbo.ShipmentInvoice smv3 ON dt3.ShipmentInvoiceId=smv3.Id WHERE smv3.Id='{Id}' GROUP BY smv3.Id,smv3.CurrencyCode,dt3.TotalAmount,dt3.Amount,dt3.ExchangeRateINV,dt3.Quantity ) SELECT sminv.VoucherTypeId, cus.CompanyName AS Partnerv, ISNULL(cus.Address,'') AS addv, ISNULL(cus.PhoneNumber,'') AS Tel, ISNULL(cus.Fax,'') AS Fax, ISNULL(sminv.Code,'DRAFT') AS Invno, ISNULL(FORMAT(sminv.InvoiceDate,'dd MMM, yyyy'),'') AS Dateinv, sm.MblNo AS MBLNo, pol.Name AS POLName, POD.Name AS PODName, ISNULL(FORMAT(sm.EtdDate,'dd MMM'),'') AS ETD, ISNULL(FORMAT(sm.EtaDate,'dd MMM'),'') AS ETA, ISNULL(sm.Quantity,'') AS Volume, (ISNULL(sm.Vessel,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(sm.VesselVoy,'')) AS vessal , CASE WHEN sminv.RevisedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 'Revised Date: ' + ISNULL(FORMAT(sminv.RevisedDate,'dd MMM, yyy'),'') ELSE '' end AS Reviseddate, CASE WHEN sminv.InvoiceTypeId = 1 AND sminv.DebitAmount<0 THEN 'CREDIT NOTE' WHEN sminv.InvoiceTypeId = 1 AND sminv.DebitAmount>=0 THEN 'DEBIT NOTE' ELSE 'INVOICE' END AS Titles, CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN 'Original Curr' ELSE curr.Name END AS Currinv, FORMAT(CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE sminv.ExchangeRateINV END,'#,##.00') AS EXT, curr.Code, ISNULL(FORMAT(sminv.DueDate,'dd MMM, yy'),'') AS Duedate, (SELECT SUM(hblnolist.quanty) FROM hblnolist WHERE hblnolist.idinv=sminv.Id) AS Quantity1, (SELECT STRING_AGG(hblnolist.hblNos,'/') FROM hblnolist WHERE hblnolist.idinv=sminv.Id) AS HBLs, (SELECT STRING_AGG(hblnolist.textc,' & ') FROM hblnolist WHERE hblnolist.idinv=sminv.Id) AS conttext2, CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyCode='VND' THEN CASE WHEN (SELECT SUM(VAT.tax8) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax8 IS NOT NULL )>0 THEN '8%: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),FORMAT((SELECT SUM(VAT.tax8) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax8 IS NOT NULL ) ,'N0') ) ELSE '' end ELSE (SELECT '8% '+ STRING_AGG(CONCAT((CASE WHEN CurrencySums.localcurr = 1 THEN FORMAT(CurrencySums.TaxAmount, 'N0') ELSE FORMAT(CurrencySums.TotalAFT,'N02') END), ' ', CurrencyCode), ' ') FROM CurrencySums WHERE CurrencySums.Vat=8) END AS Tax8 , CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyCode='VND' THEN CASE WHEN ((SELECT SUM(VAT.tax10) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax10 IS NOT NULL )>0) THEN '10%: '+ CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), FORMAT((SELECT SUM(VAT.tax10) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax10 IS NOT NULL ),'N0')) ELSE '' END ELSE (SELECT '10%: '+ STRING_AGG(CONCAT((CASE WHEN CurrencySums.localcurr = 1 THEN FORMAT(CurrencySums.TaxAmount, 'N0') ELSE FORMAT(CurrencySums.TotalAFT,'N02') END), ' ', CurrencyCode), ' ') FROM CurrencySums WHERE CurrencySums.Vat=10) END AS Tax10 , CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyCode='VND' THEN CASE WHEN ((SELECT SUM(VAT.tax5) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax5 IS NOT NULL )>0) THEN '5%: '+ CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),format((SELECT SUM(VAT.tax5) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax5 IS NOT NULL ),'N0')) ELSE '' END ELSE (SELECT '5%: '+ STRING_AGG(CONCAT((CASE WHEN CurrencySums.localcurr = 1 THEN FORMAT(CurrencySums.TaxAmount, 'N0') ELSE FORMAT(CurrencySums.TotalAFT,'N02') END), ' ', CurrencyCode), ' ') FROM CurrencySums WHERE CurrencySums.Vat LIKE '5.%') END AS Tax5 , CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyCode='VND' THEN CASE WHEN ((SELECT SUM(VAT.taxOT) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.taxOT IS NOT NULL )>0) THEN 'OT Tax: '+ CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),format((SELECT SUM(VAT.taxOT) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.taxOT IS NOT NULL ),'N0') ) ELSE '' END ELSE (SELECT 'OT Tax: '+ STRING_AGG(CONCAT((CASE WHEN CurrencySums.localcurr = 1 THEN FORMAT(CurrencySums.TaxAmount, 'N0') ELSE FORMAT(CurrencySums.TotalAFT,'N02') END), ' ', CurrencyCode), ' ') FROM CurrencySums WHERE CurrencySums.Vat<0) END AS OTtax , format((SELECT SUM(BFT) FROM Amountbft WHERE Amountbft.BFT IS NOT NULL),'N0') AS BFT, FORMAT(((SELECT SUM(VAT.tax8) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax8 IS NOT NULL ) + (SELECT SUM(VAT.tax10) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax10 IS NOT NULL )+ (SELECT SUM(VAT.taxOT) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.taxOT IS NOT NULL ) + (SELECT SUM(VAT.tax5) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax5 IS NOT NULL ) + (SELECT SUM(BFT) FROM Amountbft WHERE Amountbft.BFT IS NOT NULL) ),'N0') AS TotalAFTAX, CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyCode='VND' THEN format((SELECT SUM(BFT) FROM Amountbft WHERE Amountbft.BFT IS NOT NULL),'N0') ELSE (SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT((CASE WHEN CurrencySums.localcurr = 1 THEN FORMAT(TotalAmount, 'N0') ELSE FORMAT(TotalAmount,'N02') END), ' ', CurrencyCode), '
') FROM CurrencySums WHERE TotalAmount IS NOT NULL) END AS AmountText, CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyCode<> 'VND' THEN FORMAT(((SELECT SUM(VAT.tax8) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax8 IS NOT NULL ) + (SELECT SUM(VAT.tax10) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax10 IS NOT NULL )+ (SELECT SUM(VAT.taxOT) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.taxOT IS NOT NULL ) + (SELECT SUM(VAT.tax5) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax5 IS NOT NULL ) + (SELECT SUM(BFT) FROM Amountbft WHERE Amountbft.BFT IS NOT NULL) ),'N0') ELSE (SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT((CASE WHEN CurrencySums.localcurr = 1 THEN FORMAT(CurrencySums.TotalAFT, 'N0') ELSE FORMAT(CurrencySums.TotalAFT,'N02') END), ' ', CurrencyCode), '
') FROM CurrencySums WHERE CurrencySums.TotalAFT IS NOT NULL) END AS TotalAFTAX_bo, CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyCode='VND' THEN format((SELECT SUM(VAT.tax8) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax8 IS NOT NULL ) + (SELECT SUM(VAT.tax10) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax10 IS NOT NULL ) + (SELECT SUM(VAT.taxOT) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.taxOT IS NOT NULL ) + (SELECT SUM(VAT.tax5) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax5 IS NOT NULL ),'N0') ELSE (SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT((CASE WHEN CurrencySums.localcurr = 1 THEN FORMAT(CurrencySums.TaxAmount, 'N0') ELSE FORMAT(CurrencySums.TaxAmount,'N02') END), ' ', CurrencyCode), '
') FROM CurrencySums WHERE TaxAmount IS NOT NULL) END AS TotalVAT FROM dbo.ShipmentInvoice sminv LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner cus ON cus.Id=sminv.VendorIds LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON sm.Id = sminv.FileIds LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON curr.Id = sminv.CurrencyId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal pol ON pol.Id = sm.PolId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = sm.PodId WHERE sminv.Id='{Id}' SELECT FORMAT(CASE WHEN sminv.DebitAmount>= 0 AND dt.TypeId=2 THEN (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END) * (-1) WHEN sminv.DebitAmount>= 0 AND dt.TypeId=1 THEN ( (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END)) WHEN sminv.DebitAmount< 0 AND dt.TypeId=1 THEN (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END) * (-1) ELSE (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END) END,(CASE WHEN curr.Name='VND' THEN 'N0' ELSE 'N2' END)) AS AmountINV ,FORMAT((CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END),(CASE WHEN curr.Name='VND' THEN 'N0' ELSE 'N2' END)) AS Amountvnd, fee.Name AS namefee, unit.Name AS unit, format(dt.Quantity,'N{CQuantity}') AS Qty, FORMAT(dt.Amount,(CASE WHEN curdt.Name='VND' THEN 'N0' ELSE 'N2' END)) AS amountOG, curdt.Code AS curdt, format(dt.Vat,'N{CQuantity}') AS VAT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS Sott FROM dbo.ShipmentInvoice sminv LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner cus ON cus.Id=sminv.VendorIds LEFT JOIN dbo.ShipmentInvoiceDetail dt ON dt.ShipmentInvoiceId = sminv.Id LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON sm.Id = sminv.ShipmentId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON curr.Id = sminv.CurrencyId LEFT JOIN dbo.FeeType fee ON fee.Id=dt.DescriptionId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curdt ON curdt.Id=dt.CurrencyId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=dt.UnitId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal pol ON pol.Id = sm.PolId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = sm.PodId WHERE sminv.Id='{Id}' ORDER BY dt.[Order] ASC
Components.Template:
BILL TO
${Titles}
${Partnerv}
 ${addv}
 TELL: ${Tel} ${Fax}
Number: ${Invno}

Date: ${Dateinv}

${Reviseddate}
 
             
MBL/MAWB : ${MBLNo} Volume : ${conttext2}
HBL/HAWB : ${HBLs} Q'ty : ${Quantity1}
POL/AOL : ${POLName} ETD / ETA : ${ETD} / ${ETA}
POD/AOD : ${PODName} VSL./ FLT. : ${vessal}
Currency: : ${Currinv} Due Date : ${Duedate}
Ext rate : ${EXT}      

 

No Description Quantity Unit Price VAT % Curr. Amount

{Sott}

{namefee}

{Qty}

{unit}

{amountOG}

{VAT}

{curdt}

{AmountINV}

Total Before Tax

${BFT}

TAX Amount: ${Tax5} ${Tax8} ${Tax10} ${OTtax}

${TotalVAT}

Total

${TotalAFTAX}

 

 

BANKING DETAILS
  
ACCOUNT NAME
 :  
BANK NAME :  
BANK ADRESS :  
SWIFT CODE :  
ACCOUNT NO :

Components.Label: VAT Invoice
Components.ShowExp: this.EditForm.Entity.ActionId == 2 && this.Token.RoleNames.some(x => x.toUpperCase() == "CREATE VATINV FROM DEBIT") && !this.EditForm.Entity.VatInvoiceId

Components.Label: Print INV Multi VAT
Components.Query:
WITH hblnolist AS ( SELECT s.HblNo AS hblNos, SUM(s.Quantity) AS quanty, s.ContainerText textc, si.Id AS idinv FROM ShipmentInvoice si CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(si.HblIds, ',') AS split_hbl LEFT JOIN Shipment s ON s.Id = split_hbl.value where si.Id='{Id}' GROUP BY si.Id,s.Quantity,s.ContainerText,s.HblNo ), CurrencySums AS ( SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN (sm.DebitAmount>0 AND dt.TypeId=1) THEN (dt.Quantity*dt.Amount) WHEN sm.DebitAmount>0 AND dt.TypeId<>1 THEN (dt.Quantity*dt.Amount) * (-1) WHEN sm.DebitAmount<0 AND dt.TypeId=1 THEN (dt.Quantity*dt.Amount)* (-1) WHEN sm.DebitAmount<0 AND dt.TypeId<>1 THEN (dt.Quantity*dt.Amount) END) AS TotalAmount, SUM( CASE WHEN (sm.DebitAmount>0 AND dt.TypeId=1) THEN (ABS(dt.AmountTax)) WHEN sm.DebitAmount>0 AND dt.TypeId<>1 THEN (ABS(dt.AmountTax)) * (-1) WHEN sm.DebitAmount<0 AND dt.TypeId=1 THEN (ABS(dt.AmountTax))* (-1) WHEN sm.DebitAmount<0 AND dt.TypeId<>1 THEN (ABS(dt.AmountTax)) END ) AS TaxAmount, SUM ( CASE WHEN (sm.DebitAmount>0 AND dt.TypeId=1) THEN ( (dt.Quantity*dt.Amount) + ABS(dt.AmountTax)) WHEN sm.DebitAmount>0 AND dt.TypeId<>1 THEN ((dt.Quantity*dt.Amount) + ABS(dt.AmountTax)) *(-1) WHEN sm.DebitAmount<0 AND dt.TypeId=1 THEN ( (dt.Quantity*dt.Amount) + ABS(dt.AmountTax)) *(-1) WHEN sm.DebitAmount<0 AND dt.TypeId<>1 THEN ( (dt.Quantity*dt.Amount) + (ABS(dt.AmountTax))) END) AS TotalAFT, curr.Code AS CurrencyCode, curr.IsLocal AS localcurr FROM dbo.ShipmentInvoiceDetail dt LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON curr.Id = dt.CurrencyId LEFT JOIN dbo.ShipmentInvoice sm ON sm.Id=dt.ShipmentInvoiceId WHERE sm.Id = '{Id}' GROUP BY curr.Code,curr.IsLocal,sm.DebitAmount ), VAT AS (SELECT CASE WHEN (sminv.DebitAmount>0 AND smdt.TypeId=1) THEN CASE WHEN ISNULL(smdt.Vat,0)>0 THEN ROUND(ROUND(ROUND(smdt.Amount*smdt.ExchangeRateINV,0)*smdt.Quantity,0)*(smdt.Vat/100),0) WHEN smdt.Vat<0 THEN ROUND(ABS(smdt.Vat*smdt.ExchangeRateINV),0) ELSE 0 END WHEN (sminv.DebitAmount>0 AND smdt.TypeId<> 1) THEN (CASE WHEN ISNULL(smdt.Vat,0)>0 THEN ROUND(ROUND(ROUND(smdt.Amount*smdt.ExchangeRateINV,0)*smdt.Quantity,0)*(smdt.Vat/100),0) WHEN smdt.Vat<0 THEN ROUND(ABS(smdt.Vat*smdt.ExchangeRateINV),0) ELSE 0 END )*(-1) WHEN (sminv.DebitAmount<0 AND smdt.TypeId= 1) then (CASE WHEN ISNULL(smdt.Vat,0)>0 THEN ROUND(ROUND(ROUND(smdt.Amount*smdt.ExchangeRateINV,0)*smdt.Quantity,0)*(smdt.Vat/100),0) WHEN smdt.Vat<0 THEN ROUND(ABS(smdt.Vat*smdt.ExchangeRateINV),0) ELSE 0 END )*(-1) WHEN (sminv.DebitAmount<0 AND smdt.TypeId<> 1) then (CASE WHEN ISNULL(smdt.Vat,0)>0 THEN ROUND(ROUND(ROUND(smdt.Amount*smdt.ExchangeRateINV,0)*smdt.Quantity,0)*(smdt.Vat/100),0) WHEN smdt.Vat<0 THEN ROUND(ABS(smdt.Vat*smdt.ExchangeRateINV),0) ELSE 0 END ) END AS vatsum FROM dbo.ShipmentInvoiceDetail smdt LEFT JOIN dbo.ShipmentInvoice sminv ON smdt.ShipmentInvoiceId=sminv.Id WHERE sminv.Id='{Id}' ), Amountbft AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN (smv3.DebitAmount>0 AND dt3.TypeId=1) THEN CASE WHEN smv3.CurrencyCode<>'VND'OR smv3.CurrencyCode IS NULL THEN dt3.TotalAmount ELSE ROUND(ROUND(dt3.Amount*dt3.ExchangeRateINV,0)*dt3.Quantity,0) END WHEN smv3.DebitAmount>0 AND dt3.TypeId<>1 THEN CASE WHEN smv3.CurrencyCode<>'VND' OR smv3.CurrencyCode IS NULL THEN dt3.TotalAmount*(-1) ELSE ROUND(ROUND(dt3.Amount*dt3.ExchangeRateINV,0)*dt3.Quantity,0)*(-1) END WHEN smv3.DebitAmount<0 AND dt3.TypeId=1 THEN CASE WHEN smv3.CurrencyCode<>'VND' OR smv3.CurrencyCode IS NULL THEN dt3.TotalAmount*(-1) ELSE ROUND(ROUND(dt3.Amount*dt3.ExchangeRateINV,0)*dt3.Quantity,0)*(-1) END WHEN smv3.DebitAmount<0 AND dt3.TypeId<>1 THEN CASE WHEN smv3.CurrencyCode<>'VND' OR smv3.CurrencyCode IS NULL THEN dt3.TotalAmount ELSE ROUND(ROUND(dt3.Amount*dt3.ExchangeRateINV,0)*dt3.Quantity,0) END END AS BFT FROM dbo.ShipmentInvoiceDetail dt3 JOIN ShipmentInvoice smv3 ON dt3.ShipmentInvoiceId=smv3.Id WHERE smv3.Id='{Id}' GROUP BY smv3.Id,smv3.CurrencyCode,dt3.TotalAmount,dt3.Amount,dt3.ExchangeRateINV,dt3.Quantity,dt3.TypeId,smv3.DebitAmount ) SELECT sminv.VoucherTypeId, cus.CompanyName AS Partnerv, ISNULL(cus.Address,'') AS addv, ISNULL(cus.PhoneNumber,'') AS Tel, ISNULL(cus.Fax,'') AS Fax, ISNULL(sminv.Code,'DRAFT') AS Invno, ISNULL(FORMAT(sminv.InvoiceDate,'dd MMM, yyyy'),'') AS Dateinv, sm.MblNo AS MBLNo, pol.Name AS POLName, POD.Name AS PODName, ISNULL(FORMAT(sm.EtdDate,'dd MMM'),'') AS ETD, ISNULL(FORMAT(sm.EtaDate,'dd MMM'),'') AS ETA, ISNULL(sm.Quantity,'') AS Volume, (ISNULL(sm.Vessel,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(sm.VesselVoy,'')) AS vessal , CASE WHEN sminv.RevisedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 'Revised Date: ' + ISNULL(FORMAT(sminv.RevisedDate,'dd MMM, yyy'),'') ELSE '' end AS Reviseddate, CASE WHEN sminv.InvoiceTypeId = 1 AND sminv.DebitAmount<0 THEN 'CREDIT NOTE' WHEN sminv.InvoiceTypeId = 1 AND sminv.DebitAmount>=0 THEN 'DEBIT NOTE' ELSE 'INVOICE' END AS Titles, CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN 'Original Curr' ELSE curr.Name END AS Currinv, FORMAT(CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE sminv.ExchangeRateINV END,'#,##.00') AS EXT, curr.Code, ISNULL(FORMAT(sminv.DueDate,'dd MMM, yy'),'') AS Duedate, (SELECT SUM(hblnolist.quanty) FROM hblnolist WHERE hblnolist.idinv=sminv.Id) AS Quantity1, (SELECT STRING_AGG(hblnolist.hblNos,'/') FROM hblnolist WHERE hblnolist.idinv=sminv.Id) AS HBLs, (SELECT STRING_AGG(hblnolist.textc,' & ') FROM hblnolist WHERE hblnolist.idinv=sminv.Id) AS conttext2, format((SELECT SUM(VAT.vatsum) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.vatsum IS NOT NULL ),'N0') AS TotalVAT , format((SELECT SUM(BFT) FROM Amountbft WHERE Amountbft.BFT IS NOT NULL),'N0') AS BFT, FORMAT(((SELECT SUM(VAT.vatsum) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.vatsum IS NOT NULL ) + (SELECT SUM(BFT) FROM Amountbft WHERE Amountbft.BFT IS NOT NULL) ),'N0') AS TotalAFTAX, CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyCode='VND' THEN format((SELECT SUM(BFT) FROM Amountbft WHERE Amountbft.BFT IS NOT NULL),'N0') ELSE (SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT((CASE WHEN CurrencySums.localcurr = 1 THEN FORMAT(TotalAmount, 'N0') ELSE FORMAT(TotalAmount,'N02') END), ' ', CurrencyCode), '
') FROM CurrencySums WHERE TotalAmount IS NOT NULL) END AS BFTText, CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyCode='VND' THEN format((SELECT SUM(VAT.vatsum) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.vatsum IS NOT NULL ),'N0') ELSE (SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT((CASE WHEN CurrencySums.localcurr = 1 THEN FORMAT(CurrencySums.TaxAmount, 'N0') ELSE FORMAT(CurrencySums.TaxAmount,'N02') END), ' ', CurrencyCode), '
') FROM CurrencySums WHERE CurrencySums.TaxAmount IS NOT NULL) END AS TotalVATTEXT, CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyCode='VND' THEN FORMAT(((SELECT SUM(VAT.vatsum) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.vatsum IS NOT NULL ) + (SELECT SUM(BFT) FROM Amountbft WHERE Amountbft.BFT IS NOT NULL) ),'N0') ELSE (SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT((CASE WHEN CurrencySums.localcurr = 1 THEN FORMAT(CurrencySums.TotalAFT, 'N0') ELSE FORMAT(CurrencySums.TotalAFT,'N02') END), ' ', CurrencyCode), '
') FROM CurrencySums WHERE TotalAmount IS NOT NULL) END AS TotalAFTAXTEXT FROM dbo.ShipmentInvoice sminv LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner cus ON cus.Id=sminv.VendorIds LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON sm.Id = sminv.FileIds LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON curr.Id = sminv.CurrencyId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal pol ON pol.Id = sm.PolId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = sm.PodId WHERE sminv.Id='{Id}' SELECT FORMAT(CASE WHEN sminv.DebitAmount>= 0 AND dt.TypeId=2 THEN (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END) * (-1) WHEN sminv.DebitAmount>= 0 AND dt.TypeId=1 THEN ( (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END)) WHEN sminv.DebitAmount< 0 AND dt.TypeId=1 THEN (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END) * (-1) ELSE (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END) END,(CASE WHEN curr.Name='VND' THEN 'N0' ELSE 'N2' END)) AS AmountINV ,FORMAT((CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END),(CASE WHEN curr.Name='VND' THEN 'N0' ELSE 'N2' END)) AS Amountvnd, format(( CASE WHEN sminv.DebitAmount> 0 AND dt.TypeId=1 THEN CASE WHEN (sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL OR sminv.CurrencyCode <> 'VND') AND dt.Vat>0 THEN (dt.Quantity * dt.Amount) * (ISNULL(dt.Vat,0)/100) WHEN (sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL OR sminv.CurrencyCode <> 'VND') AND dt.Vat < 0 THEN ABS(dt.Vat) WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' AND dt.Vat>0 THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0)*(ISNULL(dt.Vat,0)/100),0) WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' AND dt.Vat<0 THEN ABS(dt.Vat)*dt.ExchangeRateINV ELSE ROUND(dt.Quantity * dt.Amount * (ISNULL(dt.Vat,0)/100),0) END WHEN sminv.DebitAmount > 0 AND dt.TypeId<>1 THEN (CASE WHEN (sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL OR sminv.CurrencyCode <> 'VND') AND dt.Vat>0 THEN (dt.Quantity * dt.Amount) * (ISNULL(dt.Vat,0)/100) WHEN (sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL OR sminv.CurrencyCode <> 'VND') AND dt.Vat < 0 THEN ABS(dt.Vat) WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' AND dt.Vat>0 THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0)*(ISNULL(dt.Vat,0)/100),0) WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' AND dt.Vat<0 THEN ABS(dt.Vat)*dt.ExchangeRateINV ELSE ROUND(dt.Quantity * dt.Amount * (ISNULL(dt.Vat,0)/100),0) END)*(-1) WHEN sminv.DebitAmount < 0 AND dt.TypeId=1 THEN (CASE WHEN (sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL OR sminv.CurrencyCode <> 'VND') AND dt.Vat>0 THEN (dt.Quantity * dt.Amount) * (ISNULL(dt.Vat,0)/100) WHEN (sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL OR sminv.CurrencyCode <> 'VND') AND dt.Vat < 0 THEN ABS(dt.Vat) WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' AND dt.Vat>0 THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0)*(ISNULL(dt.Vat,0)/100),0) WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' AND dt.Vat<0 THEN ABS(dt.Vat)*dt.ExchangeRateINV ELSE ROUND(dt.Quantity * dt.Amount * (ISNULL(dt.Vat,0)/100),0) END)*(-1) WHEN sminv.DebitAmount < 0 AND dt.TypeId<>1 THEN (CASE WHEN (sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL OR sminv.CurrencyCode <> 'VND') AND dt.Vat>0 THEN (dt.Quantity * dt.Amount) * (ISNULL(dt.Vat,0)/100) WHEN (sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL OR sminv.CurrencyCode <> 'VND') AND dt.Vat < 0 THEN ABS(dt.Vat) WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' AND dt.Vat>0 THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0)*(ISNULL(dt.Vat,0)/100),0) WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' AND dt.Vat<0 THEN ABS(dt.Vat)*dt.ExchangeRateINV ELSE ROUND(dt.Quantity * dt.Amount * (ISNULL(dt.Vat,0)/100),0) END) END) , (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyCode='VND' then 'N0' else 'N02' end)) AS AmtVAT, fee.Name AS namefee, unit.Name AS unit, format(dt.Quantity,'N{CQuantity}') AS Qty, FORMAT(dt.Amount,(CASE WHEN curdt.Name='VND' THEN 'N0' ELSE 'N2' END)) AS amountOG, curdt.Code AS curdt, format(dt.Vat,'N{CQuantity}') AS VAT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS Sott FROM dbo.ShipmentInvoice sminv LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner cus ON cus.Id=sminv.VendorIds LEFT JOIN dbo.ShipmentInvoiceDetail dt ON dt.ShipmentInvoiceId = sminv.Id LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON sm.Id = sminv.ShipmentId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON curr.Id = sminv.CurrencyId LEFT JOIN dbo.FeeType fee ON fee.Id=dt.DescriptionId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curdt ON curdt.Id=dt.CurrencyId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=dt.UnitId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal pol ON pol.Id = sm.PolId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = sm.PodId WHERE sminv.Id='{Id}' ORDER BY dt.[Order] ASC

Components.Label: ShipmentInvoiceDetail
Components.Query:
{
    "sql": "SELECT ds.[TypeId] AS [TypeId],
    ISNULL(ds.[ShipmentInvoiceId], sf1.[ShipmentInvoiceId]) AS [ShipmentInvoiceId],
    ds.[ShipmentId], ds.FileId,
    ISNULL(ds.[VendorId], sf1.[VendorId]) AS [VendorId],
    ISNULL(ds.[DescriptionId], sf1.[DescriptionId]) AS [DescriptionId],
    ISNULL(ds.[TotalAmountTax], sf1.[TotalAmountTax]) AS [TotalAmountTax],
    ISNULL(ds.[TotalAmount], sf1.[TotalAmount]) AS [TotalAmount],
    ISNULL(ds.[AmountTax], sf1.[AmountTax]) AS [AmountTax],
    ISNULL(ds.[Amount], sf1.[Amount]) AS [Amount],
    ISNULL(ds.[Quantity], sf1.[Quantity]) AS [Quantity],
    ISNULL(ds.[UnitId], sf1.[UnitId]) AS [UnitId],
    ISNULL(ds.[Vat], sf1.[Vat]) AS [Vat],
    ISNULL(ds.[CurrencyId], sf1.[CurrencyId]) AS [CurrencyId],
    ISNULL(ds.[CurrencyCode], sf1.[CurrencyCode]) AS [CurrencyCode],
    ISNULL(ds.[Tax], sf1.[Tax]) AS [Tax],
    ISNULL(ds.[Notes], sf1.[Notes]) AS [Notes],
    ISNULL(ds.[Docs], sf1.[Docs]) AS [Docs],
    ISNULL(ds.[IsObh], sf1.[IsObh]) AS [IsObh],
    ISNULL(ds.[ObhId], sf1.[ObhId]) AS [ObhId],
    ISNULL(ds.[IsNoDocs], sf1.[IsNoDocs]) AS [IsNoDocs],
    ISNULL(ds.[ExchangeRateVND], sf1.[ExchangeRateVND]) AS [ExchangeRateVND],
    ISNULL(ds.[ExchangeRateUSD], sf1.[ExchangeRateUSD]) AS [ExchangeRateUSD],
    ISNULL(ds.[IsContainer], sf1.[IsContainer]) AS [IsContainer],
    ISNULL(ds.[IsCBM], sf1.[IsCBM]) AS [IsCBM],
    ISNULL(ds.[IsFreight], sf1.[IsFreight]) AS [IsFreight],
    ISNULL(ds.[IsLogistics], sf1.[IsLogistics]) AS [IsLogistics],
    ISNULL(ds.[IsTrucking], sf1.[IsTrucking]) AS [IsTrucking],
    ISNULL(ds.[IsKGS], sf1.[IsKGS]) AS [IsKGS], 
    ISNULL(ds.[IsGW], sf1.[IsGW]) AS [IsGW], 
    ISNULL(ds.[Order], sf1.[Order]) AS [Order],
    ISNULL(ds.[ExchangeRate], sf1.[ExchangeRate]) AS [ExchangeRate],
    ISNULL(ds.[SettlementNo], sf1.[SettlementNo]) AS [SettlementNo],
    ISNULL(ds.[Active], sf1.[Active]) AS [Active],
    ISNULL(ds.[InsertedDate], sf1.[InsertedDate]) AS [InsertedDate],
    ISNULL(ds.[InsertedBy], sf1.[InsertedBy]) AS [InsertedBy],
    ISNULL(ds.[UpdatedDate], sf1.[UpdatedDate]) AS [UpdatedDate],
    ISNULL(ds.[UpdatedBy], sf1.[UpdatedBy]) AS [UpdatedBy],
    ISNULL(ds.[BasedId], sf1.[BasedId]) AS [BasedId],
    ISNULL(ds.[PmTypeId], sf1.[PmTypeId]) AS [PmTypeId],
    CASE WHEN ds.IsLock = 0 THEN CONCAT('-', NEWID()) ELSE sf1.Id END AS Id,
    '{TokenUserId}' AS InsertedBy, '{ShipmentInvoiceId}' AS ShipmentInvoiceId,
    ds.Id AS ShipmentFeeId,
    ds.IsLock as IsLock,
    ds.IsAdvCustomer as IsAdvCustomer,
    ds.IsLock as NoSubmit,
    sf1.ExTotalAmountTax,
    sf1.ExTotalAmount,
    sf1.ExAmountTax,
    sf1.ExAmount,
    sf1.Payable,
    sf1.Receivable,
    isnull(sf1.ExchangeRateINV,ds.ExchangeRateVND) as ExchangeRateINV,
    isnull(sf1.ExchangeRateINV2,ds.ExchangeRateUSD) as ExchangeRateINV2
    FROM ShipmentFee AS ds 
    left join ShipmentInvoiceDetail as sf1 on ds.Id = sf1.ShipmentFeeId and (sf1.ShipmentInvoiceId = '{ShipmentInvoiceId}' or sf1.ShipmentInvoiceId = ds.ShipmentInvoiceId)
    left join MasterData cr on ds.CurrencyId = cr.Id 
    WHERE (( '{ShipmentInvoiceId}' LIKE N'-%' AND ds.ShipmentId IN ('{HblIds}') 
    AND ds.VendorId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{VendorIds}', ',')) AND ({FeeTypeId}) AND ('1' = '{ObhTypeId}' OR ( '2' = '{ObhTypeId}' and ( ds.ObhId IS NOT NULL OR ds.ParentId IS NOT NULL) OR ( '3' = '{ObhTypeId}' AND ds.ObhId IS NULL AND ds.ParentId IS NULL)))) OR ( '{ShipmentInvoiceId}' NOT LIKE N'-%' AND ds.Id IN ( SELECT ShipmentFeeId FROM ShipmentInvoiceDetail WHERE ShipmentInvoiceId = '{ShipmentInvoiceId}')))",
    "total": "select count(ds.Id) as total from ShipmentFee as ds WHERE (( '{ShipmentInvoiceId}' LIKE N'-%' AND ds.ShipmentId IN ('{HblIds}') AND ds.VendorId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{VendorIds}', ',')) AND ({FeeTypeId}) AND ('1' = '{ObhTypeId}' OR ( '2' = '{ObhTypeId}' and ( ds.ObhId IS NOT NULL OR ds.ParentId IS NOT NULL) OR ( '3' = '{ObhTypeId}' AND ds.ObhId IS NULL AND ds.ParentId IS NULL)))) OR ( '{ShipmentInvoiceId}' NOT LIKE N'-%' AND ds.Id IN ( SELECT ShipmentFeeId FROM ShipmentInvoiceDetail WHERE ShipmentInvoiceId = '{ShipmentInvoiceId}')))"
}
Components.PreQuery:
{
    "HblIds": this.EditForm.Entity.HblIds.split(',').join("','"),
    "MblIds": this.EditForm.Entity.FileIds.split(',').join("','"),
    "VendorIds": this.EditForm.Entity.VendorIds,
    "ShipmentInvoiceId": this.EditForm.Entity.Id,
    "ExchangeRateINV": this.EditForm.Entity.ExchangeRateINV || 1,
    "ExchangeRateINV2": this.EditForm.Entity.ExchangeRateINV2 || 1,
    "ObhTypeId": this.EditForm.Entity.ObhTypeId,
    "FeeTypeId": this.EditForm.Entity.FeeTypeId || "1,2,3,4",
    "Currency": this.EditForm.Entity.Currency ? this.EditForm.Entity.Currency.Code : 'VND',
    "CurrencyId": this.EditForm.Entity.CurrencyId
}
